thread.title: Asian paradise in Paris
thread.title_full: Asian paradise in Paris - Review of Shangri-La Hotel Paris, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: KeyfidelM
title: Asian paradise in Paris
text: It's one of the best hotel in Paris , specially if you have the suite with the Eiffel Tower view . It's excellent service , room and pool very nice , the locations it's convinience and short walking distance to the Eiffel towel . been in this hotel many time , overall its one of my favorite hotel in paris .
